description: The bank account manipulation and management.

testCases.expectation: As a person with bank accounts, I expect to be able to link my bank account to the system given some sort of unique and secure bank account identifier.
testCases.reality: In the Account list view, there is a text field to enter in my bank account ID, and an Add button. I enter in my bank account ID, click Add,and see my bank account added to the list of accounts.

testCases.expectation: After having added some accounts, I expect to be able to sort through my list of accounts in a modular manner.
testCases.reality: After having added some accounts, I can click on any column and sort my accounts by that column.

testCases.expectation: After having added some accounts, I expect some way of disassociating my bank account from the system, in case I wish to keep that information private.
testCases.reality: I can select an account and click Remove Selected to remove the bank account from my list of accounts.

Comments: It would be great to have the Export to CSV functionality for the bank account list as well.
